title: Council Decision of 20 January 1997 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives (97/C 36/07)
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 20 January 1997 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives (97/C 36/07)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: Mrs Elizabeth McANULTY is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives in place of Miss Jane WINSHIP, for the remainder of her term of office, which ends on 22 October 1998.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 January 1997.
For the Council
The President
J. VAN AARTSEN
(1) OJ No L 33, 11. 2. 1980, p. 13.
(2) OJ No C 292, 7. 11. 1995, p. 2.
